bibl.title: B.A. van Groningen and J.C. van Oven, The Warren Papyri (P. Warren).
bibl.seg: David M., B.A. van Groningen and J.C. van Oven, The Warren Papyri (P. Warren). (Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. I.)
Leiden, E.J. Brill, 1941, 4Â°, ix-74 pp., 7 pll.

C.R. par Harold I. Bell, CR 60 (1946) pp. 83-84. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 22 (1942) pp. 133-135. - David Cohen, Museum 52 (1947) coll. 33-35. - Alvaro d'Ors, Emerita 12 (1944) pp. 383-387. - Marcel Hombert, AntCl 14 (1945) pp. 239-241; - ChrEg 17 (1942) No. 33, pp. 159-160. - C.H. Roberts, JEA 32 (1946) pp. 107-108 [concerne aussi: Pap. Lugd.-Bat. II-III]. - Eric G. Turner, JHS 73 (1953) pp. 163-164 [concerne aussi: Pap. Lugd.-Bat. II-VI].
